result.html: Beidh an bua agamI will win.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an bua agamI will win.

result.eng: This was the first time Italy won.

result.eng: If they are strong enough, they will prevail over the system.

result.eng: Cavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: The skills of musicians are gifts from God.

result.eng: His talent is that he understands people.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.

result.eng: She has a talent for asking clever questions.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: The Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.

result.html: Ní bhfaighfear do bhuaidhYou cannot be beaten.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfaiġfear do ḃuaiḋYou cannot be beaten.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
